attributes.action: increase research and information into SUDEP - Sudden unexpected death in Epilepsy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is should be more recognised in not only the medical but also general society. 

When my Autistic brother was diagnosed with Epilepsy we were never told about SUDEP and that it mainly occurs in young people. My brother was 19 when he died, and it took nearly a year for an inquest. More needs to be understood about this increasing killer!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "increase research and information into SUDEP - Sudden unexpected death in Epilepsy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20220


Prime Minister's Office
